name: Space Attack 2 Beta Web GL
description:
This is a Web GL version of my unity project Space Attack 2 Beta(taken from Unity FPS  Sample).Fight dangerous bots from mars pickup new weapons, jetpacks Please support me by Donating. My projects are free of cost. Also follow me and share my project.You can download the full executable version on  this link: https://space-attack.itch.io/space-attack-2-beta

Note: I forgot to remove the quit button in the Web GL version. Just ignore the quit button.

What's New:

Added new intro

Added quit button

Added new level
